article: I'm Li Bohao, a Chinese student. Mike is my good friend. He is  _  England. He is 14 years old. Mike is tall and strong. He has a round face, a wide mouth and a big nose. And he has  _  brown hair. Red is his favorite  _  He has a red cap, a red T-shirt and a  _  jacket. Mike's English is very good. He  _  me with (......) my English. Sally is Mike's sister. She is ten years old. She looks like Mike. She has a round  _  and two big eyes. Blue is  _  favorite color. Her pencil is blue, her eraser is blue and her rulers  _  blue, too. Look!  _  blue pants are these? They are Sally's. Mike and Sally are in Henan now. Mike is in Class 6, Grade 7. He and I are in the  _  class. Sally is in Class 4, Grade 4. We can see her in school.
